snippet: A 9-year-old boy was repeatedly stabbed in the back by a 12-year-old boy at a playground, then ran screaming to his home and collapsed on his porch, witnesses and the police said Tuesday.
abstract: Nine-year-old Michael Conner Verkerke dies after being repeatedly stabbed in back by 12-year-old boy at playground in Kentwood, Michigan; assailant pleads not guilty to murder in juvenile court.
lead_paragraph: A 9-year-old boy was repeatedly stabbed in the back by a 12-year-old boy at a playground, then ran screaming to his home and collapsed on his porch, witnesses and the police said Tuesday.

headline.main: Michigan: Boy Faces Murder Charge Over Stabbing at Playground
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Boy Faces Murder Charge Over Stabbing at Playground
